Description:
You meet a werewolf resting near a ladder, when you get closer he says:

"Hello travelers, my name is Charls. My friend Binks and I founded a werewolf village far from here after serving in the Wolf Wars.

Now the village is well established and I travel in search of gems or magical items to help me improve the magical defenses of our village.
DescriptionAction: I'm willing to buy anything that might be useful to me that you don't need."
